passage.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a long narrow area with walls on either side which connects one room or place to another
passage.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: My office is just along the passage.
We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
passage.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a short part of a book, poem, speech, piece of music etc
passage.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He read out a short passage from the Bible.
passage.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the movement of people or vehicles along a road or across an area of land
passage.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Both sides agreed to allow the free passage of medical supplies into the area.
He was guaranteed safe passage out of the country.
The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
passage.translation[0].definitions[3].de: when a new law is discussed and accepted by a parliament or Congress
passage.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: They are expecting the new legislation to have quite a rough passage  (=be discussed and criticized a lot) through Parliament.
The bill was amended several times during its passage through Congress.
passage.translation[0].definitions[4].ex: My parents couldn’t afford the passage to America.
passage.translation[0].definitions[5].de: a tube in your body that air or liquid can pass through
passage.translation[0].definitions[6].ex: The police forced a passage through the crowd.
passage.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: A narrow passage led to a small room at the back of the house.
He groped his way along the dark passage.
The air in these underground passages is cold and damp.
The bookcase moved to reveal a secret passage.
We wandered through a maze of passages.
passage.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the progress of a law, bill etc through parliament before it takes effect
passage.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A month after its passage, Italy’s insider-trading law is continuing to stir debate.
One result of the oil crisis could be a slowdown in the passage of a tougher Clean Air Act.
